entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] CarouselView many issues with CurrentItem bindings #23023
  • Carousel on MAUI .NET Application Not working. #23020
  • Splash Screen background does not respect the Color define in MauiSplashScreen #23018
  • MAUI workload is missing Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.win-arm64 #23016
    Backlog
  • Shell.BackButtonBehavior interferes with Flyout icon #23015
  • App crashes when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #23014
  • SecureStorage returns null for all values after restarting app (Android) #23013
  • Version 17.10.0 will not parse one of my XAML pages in a maui app #23012
  • Maui programs on Windows and Android do not access sites and url #23011
  • .NET 8 MAUI Push Notifications (Android) using Azure Notification Hub FCM V1 protocol #23010
  • NotificationHubs Version 4.2 Runtime Error #23009
  • .Net Maui Styles break in 17.10 of Visual Studio #23008
  • Resize, when 200% Zoomed Items present in Home screen are getting truncated: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Home Screen_Home Screen_Resize. #23005
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Edit box outline is not visible for Ingredients, Recipe, Review edit field: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Usability #23003
    .NET 8 SR8
  • There is No Status message is announced to screen reader users when results are loaded: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Recipes Search_Search box_Status message. #23002
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Voiceover is not announced "item added or updated" when user is adding or editing a new Recipe or existing Recipe: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes Edit_Edit Recipe_Screen reader. #23001
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Voiceover is not announcing for Recipe search and My recipes as list items: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Home Screen_Home Screen_Screen reader. #23000
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Splash screen and Material Icons not showing correctly on Android Release build, real device. #22999
  • Android entry handler not working anymore in .net8 #22997
  • [Android] "PlatformView cannot be null here" crash when switching shell tabs #22996
  • Can't build MAUI project in Release mode #22995
  • WebView is not showing web pages properly #22994
  • [MAUI]When the window is reduced the end of the scroll bar is not fully displayed #22993
  • [MAUI]When rotating the 'Edit recipe' page to landscape mode, the letter 'p' in the 'update' button is not displayed properly. #22991
    Backlog
  • Feature Request: Built-in function to open projects maximized and customizable mouse effects on specific elements #22988
    Triaged
  • DatePicker Color Icon #22987
    Backlog
  • VisualDiagnostics.VisualTreeChanged returns null parent elements, -1 Child Index Values, for new items. #22986
    Backlog
  • Cannot publish Windows app package due to sign tool error #22985

Closed

  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping #22580
    Backlog
  • [Windows] When the DPI is adjusted to non-100%, drawing strings with GraphicsView creates jitter #18783
  • [regression/8.0.0] Border Background Issue in Android #18427
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Hosting.EffectsFactory' has been registered #22748

PullRequests

Created

  • refactor: 'Path.GetTempFileName()' is insecure. Use 'Path.GetRandomFileNam… #23024
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100.preview6 #23021
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Planning
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22984
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22983
    area-infrastructure
  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping - fix #22741
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.1 to 1.5.4 #22992
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update arcade and xharness #22982
  • [main] Update arcade and xharness #22981

Updated

  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Support for images inside HTML label #21679
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
    area-image
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • use raw string literals #19961
    legacy-area-perf, area-architecture, community ✨, t/perf
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area-xaml
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Color(s) are not set #15668
    area-drawing, community ✨, stale
  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
    area-xaml
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [tests] Try a newer xunit #22860
    area-testing
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
